question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. white car
B. orange "Z" sign
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The orange "Z" sign is mounted on a building facade that is directly adjacent to the camera's viewpoint, while the white car is several meters away on the street, making the depth relationship very obvious.
